sentences.sContent: In this depiction of the rod-shaped E. coli, two flagella trail from one end while hairlike pili surround a capsule full of tangled nucleoids.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this depiction of the rod-shaped E. coli, two flagella trail from one end while hairlike pili surround a capsule full of tangled nucleoids.
sentences.sCn: 在创作这个杆状的大肠杆菌时，其表现出的形式为一端甩出两条鞭毛，同时细微的菌毛围绕在布满凌乱菌核的荚膜上。

sentences.sContent: Lungs are more complex than either of these organs, containing several different cell types that form delicate, hairlike capillaries and a maze of branching air sacs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lungs are more complex than either of these organs, containing several different cell types that form delicate, hairlike capillaries and a maze of branching air sacs.
sentences.sCn: 但是肺的复杂性要超过这两种器官，肺里有几种不同的细胞，要分别形成细微的、头发丝一样的毛细血管，和迂回曲折的分支状的气囊。

synos.tran: 毛发似的；细微的；细长的

words.tran: 毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的
有毛发的；长着...头发的（常用以构成复合词）
生长毛发；形成毛状纤维
